title: Enhancing Learning Design Competencies: Collaborative Learning Projects for Scientific Concept Exploration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific terminology and understanding of experimental methods
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can present three or more solutions to given scientific problems (e.g., ecosystem balance analysis) through collaborative learning.
Learners can share experimental data with team members using digital collaboration tools and write reports with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can evaluate team members' contributions on a 5-point scale and provide two or more constructive feedbacks through peer assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
